channel.title: Connecting
channel.description:
i really need help connecting to my no -ip.org okayy here its the probleme
When i put the ip to connect to 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 its connect but when i put the ip as my no -ip - runestorm.no-ip.org its not gonna connect whyy ? please help mee post yourskype please

item.title: Connecting
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

If you’re on the same computer the server is running off of, you must connect using localhost (aka 127.0.0.1, or 0.0.0.0 or even “localhost”).
If you’re on the same network, you can use your LAN IP (usually 192.168.X.X), your no-ip (Assuming it’s on), or your real IP (found here).
If you’re on any other network, you must use either the No-IP or your real IP.

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting
item.dc:creator: @1_2_3_4_KOED 1 2 3 4 KOED
item.description:
@1_2_3_4_KOED wrote:

Make sure you have port forwarded correctly “canyouseeme.org” and type in your port number when your source is running that will let you know if your port is open. Also make sure your IP address matches the one if you are using No-ip duc which I assume you are.

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting

item.description:
@Bl3nd wrote:

Did you port-forward correctly?

p.s. Paying/rewarding/etc. is not allowed on this forum.
